entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -27.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
